SEARCH

Class QuizModal

java.lang.Object
QuizModal
public class QuizModal extends Object
This class is a QuizModal class which contain two data in 3*3 array (questions and answer) After a constructor is created the questions and answer array and loaded then random questions are generated based on difficulty level, the answer are checked using the difficulty level index and a parameter which would be a user answer the score and chance are increment or decremented accordingly. Finally, there are helper method to set visibility and disable for GUI component in view and method to draw a stroke rectangle also used in view.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    checkAnswer(String userAnswer)
    This method checks answers, since answer array is also stored in same settings as question array, the question index and answer index are equal, based on this the method uses .equalIgnoreCase method and has the userAnswer as the parameter and compares it with answer array Index (which is equal to current question Index) id these two are equal the method returns true else false
    void
    decrementChance()
    Decrements the chance by 1
    void
    disableSetter(boolean disable, Node... buttons)
    This method is a disable setter for buttons, same logic as setVisibility() Method only changes the disable properties for buttons
    void
    drawQuizScreenStrokeRectangle(GraphicsContext gc)
    This method draws a rectangle with stroke and uses GraphicContext
    int
    getChance()
    Getter for Chance
    String
    getQuestions()
    Getter for questions generates random question from question array using Random class of java, where its parameter value is questions arrays length and store in integer called currentQuestionIndex.The difficulty index is used to determine the index of the question array and currentQuestionIndex gets random index from the difficulty index which returns random question from the difficultyIndex.

  • Method Details

    • setDifficultyIndex

      public void setDifficultyIndex(int level)
      Setter for difficulty Index
      Parameters:
      level - an integer value that determines level of difficulty

    • getQuestions

      public String getQuestions()
      Getter for questions generates random question from question array using Random class of java, where its parameter value is questions arrays length and store in integer called currentQuestionIndex.The difficulty index is used to determine the index of the question array and currentQuestionIndex gets random index from the difficulty index which returns random question from the difficultyIndex.
      Returns:
      question String from question array

    • checkAnswer

      public boolean checkAnswer(String userAnswer)
      This method checks answers, since answer array is also stored in same settings as question array, the question index and answer index are equal, based on this the method uses .equalIgnoreCase method and has the userAnswer as the parameter and compares it with answer array Index (which is equal to current question Index) id these two are equal the method returns true else false
      Parameters:
      userAnswer - a String for user answer
      Returns:
      boolean if condition met

    • getScore

      Getter for score
      Returns:
      value of score

      Getter for Chance
      Returns:
      value of chance

    • incrementScore

      public void incrementScore()
      Increments the score by 1

    • decrementChance

      public void decrementChance()
      Decrements the chance by 1

    • restartValue

      public void restartValue()
      Sets the value of score and chance to 0 and 3 when called

    • setVisibility

      public void setVisibility(boolean visible, Node... nodes)
      This method is a visibility setter for javafx nodes(GUI components) ... is a vararg parameter, which allows the multiple arguments of specific types. nodes acts like an array so, we can use foreach loop takes two parameters a boolean value, and variable number of javafx.scene.Nodes Object then runs foreach loop, for each node in [nodes array] setVisible to boolean visible value
      Parameters:
      visible - boolean value
      nodes - javafx.Scene.node elements

    • disableSetter

      public void disableSetter(boolean disable, Node... buttons)
      This method is a disable setter for buttons, same logic as setVisibility() Method only changes the disable properties for buttons
      Parameters:
      disable - boolean value
      buttons - javafx.sScene.node Named buttons

    • drawQuizScreenStrokeRectangle

      public void drawQuizScreenStrokeRectangle(GraphicsContext gc)

      gc - GraphicContext
